verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H595>I<s%> am a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> this <S%H3117>day;<s%> I <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> and come <S%H935>in:<s%> also the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> will go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and <S%H1931>he<s%> will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H3423>possess<s%> them: and <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and to <S%H5747>Og,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of them, <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H853><s%> he <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall give them <S%H5414>up<s%> before your <S%H6440>face,<s%> that ye may <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them according unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage,<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> be <S%H6206>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> it is that doth <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee; he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7503>fail<s%> thee, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thee.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> must <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them; and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt cause them to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> it is that doth <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; <S%H1931>he<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> with <S%H5973>thee,<s%> he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7503>fail<s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thee: <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> which <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> At the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7093><s%> of every <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> in the <S%H4150>solemnity<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H8059>release,<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles,<s%>

When <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> thou shalt <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their <S%H241>hearing.<s%>

Gather the people <S%H6950>together,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> and <S%H2945>children,<s%> and thy <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is within thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> they may <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H4616>that<s%> they may <S%H3925>learn,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> law: <S%H8451><s%>

And that their <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> any thing, may <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as long <S%H3605>as<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> thy <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7126>approach<s%> that thou must <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and present <S%H3320>yourselves<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> that I may give him a <S%H6680>charge.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> and presented <S%H3320>themselves<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of a <S%H6051>cloud:<s%> and the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thou shalt <S%H7901>sleep<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thy <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> will rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> and go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5236>strangers<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to be <S%H7130>among<s%> them, and will <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me, and <S%H6565>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them.

Then my <S%H639>anger<s%> shall be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and I will <S%H5800>forsake<s%> them, and I will <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them, and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H398>devoured,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> and <S%H6869>troubles<s%> shall <S%H4672>befall<s%> them; so that they will <S%H559>say<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> Are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> come <S%H4672>upon<s%> us, <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us?

And <S%H595>I<s%> will surely <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H5641><s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evils<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall have <S%H6213>wrought,<s%> in <S%H3588>that<s%> they are <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H853><s%> ye <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> for you, and <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H853>it<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> it in their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> may <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5707>witness<s%> for me against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> when I shall have <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%> and they shall have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and filled <S%H7646>themselves,<s%> and waxen <S%H1878>fat;<s%> then will they <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and <S%H5006>provoke<s%> me, and <S%H6565>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> and <S%H6869>troubles<s%> are <S%H4672>befallen<s%> them, that <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> shall <S%H6030>testify<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> them as a <S%H5707>witness;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> out of the <S%H4480>mouths<s%> <S%H6310><s%> of their <S%H2233>seed:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3336>imagination<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> go <S%H6213>about,<s%> even <S%H3117>now,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore.<s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> therefore <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3925>taught<s%> <S%H853>it<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H6680>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> a charge, and <S%H559>said,<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto them: and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3789>writing<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> a <S%H5612>book,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>finished,<s%>

That <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it in the <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6654><s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> against thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H4805>rebellion,<s%> and thy <S%H7186>stiff<s%> <S%H6203>neck:<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> while I am <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> ye have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H3588>how<s%> much <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H4194>death?<s%>

Gather <S%H6950><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and your <S%H7860>officers,<s%> that I may <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in their <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to record against them.

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H4194>death<s%> ye will utterly <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H7843><s%> yourselves, and turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you; and <S%H7451>evil<s%> will <S%H7122>befall<s%> you in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> ye will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> through the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>ended.<s%>
